PathOfBuilding.Notes:
Boot enchants:
Best: Attack/Cast speed Viable: Crit chance or Regen
Helm enchants:
Best: Cyclone Attack speed Viable: Cyclone damage, Vulnerability curse effect, Warchief damage/Grants damage while active, Blood rage frenzy charge/attack speed
Gloves:
Best: War, Force Viable: Reflection
Build can do all map mods except "cannot Leech" and "60% reduced recovery" (both doable if you use Blood of the Karui life flask).
Elder and Shaper viable.
